subject: Basketball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: After two years of roster purging and budget slashing, the Knicks got their first big payoff on Monday and could hardly contain their optimism — contracts and signing dates notwithstanding.
snippet: After two years of roster purging and budget slashing, the Knicks got their first big payoff on Monday and could hardly contain their optimism — contracts and signing dates notwithstanding.
